live_updates: Technicians are ready to restore services once hydro power to our equipment is working again. Thank you for your patience.
We await hydro power to be restored in the affected areas. Once hydro is restored our services will begin to come online.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
56126.summary: Some customers in Fort St. John are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
56126.title: Dec 14 - Fort St. John | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve. Thank you for your patience.
